thread.section_title: David Sklar & Associates Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of David Sklar & Associates Inc. | davidsklar.com
thread.title: K. Brown
thread.title_full: David Sklar & Associates Inc. reviewed by K. Brown

author: K. Brown
title: K. Brown
text:
They were suggested to me by a friends accountant.
I didn't know what to expect but, I had been out of gainful employment for the better part of 5 years and when I initially lost my job we were just past the first trimester for our 1st child. That, combined with the economic downturn, meant that financially as time passed, I had descended into a financial abyss that I could not realistically overcome.
I arrived at the office without an appointment and they immediately accommodated me, even though everyone had existing commitments. The receptionist actually reached out to Mrs. Sklar who got things started. She in turn then introduced me to the specialist that would be looking after my account: Jackie.
Jackie was incredible!
Everyone was very warm, professional, caring and helpful.
I wish it had never come to this but, I'm thankful that they were here to help.
David Sklar and his team are Outstanding!
